Wave.Help: {gold}Bot Waves{default} - Type {lime}!wave{default} to start, {lime}!dif{default} to change difficulty
Wave.Welcome: {lightblue}Want to fight bots?{default} Type {lime}wave{default} to start {gold}Bot Waves{default} mode!
Wave.NeedWaveActive: {red}Wave mode must be active first!{default} Type {lime}!wave{default} to start.
Wave.TooManyPlayers: {red}Too many players ({0} max).{default} Wave mode disabled for large groups.
Wave.AdminStart: {gold}Wave Mode{default} {green}ENABLED{default} by admin - Starting with {lime}{0}{default} bots!
Wave.BotCountChanged: {gold}Wave Mode{default} - Bot count changed to {lime}{0}{default}. Round restarting...
Wave.PlayerLimitExceeded: {red}Player limit exceeded!{default} Wave mode has been disabled.
Wave.BotsCapped: {yellow}Server limit:{default} Only {0} of {1} bots could spawn.
Wave.LimitedSpawns: {yellow}Limited spawns:{default} {0} bots alive, {lime}{2} total kills{default} needed to win!
